name: scanmail
short_description:
"mailbox-monitor" aims at security check for mailbox as well as pop3 server. Its main functions are to check the security of all incoming emails and recognize and check most pop3 servers. So far, around 20,000 servers (including hotmail, gmail, etc.) have been recognized and the number is still increasing. We are dedicated to the test of mailbox security and try to find out passwords that are too easy to be cracked down, so as to avoid the danger of mailbox being stolen. 
Unfortunately, trail downloading of this software is not supported. Whoever in need could pay via paypal. We will send this software via email after having received your money transfer. 
Special Service: We could design specific mailbox monitor regarding your special needs. Fees will be charged according to the level of difficulty.
